H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H6913.def: = place where one or more people are buried, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, stench and decay, uncleanness

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H7027.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Abiel<SDBH:אֲבִיאֵל>}; tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► father of king {L:Saul<SDBH:שָׁאוּל>}

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H6279.def: = action by which humans ask a deity earnestly to do something

81.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H4421.def: = armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H3898.def: = action by which humans ingest food

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3211.def: = direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate

H7497.def: = man; ► ancestor of a tribe of giants

H5178.def: = a reddish-brown metal, ◄ mined from the hills, ► and used, together with {L:tin<SDBH:בְּדִיל>}, for the production of bronze

H7013.def: = a piece of metal, sharpened to a point, usually made out of iron or bronze, attached to the end of the spear

H4948.def: = a measure of the heaviness of an object

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H3967.def: = state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

H2296.def: = state in which someone wears clothes or armor

H2319.def: = state in which an object has been in existence for only a short time ◄ because of having recently been built or produced

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H6086.def: = any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit

H2595.def: = a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp {L:iron<SDBH:בַּרְזֶל>} head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

H707.def: = causative action by which humans produce fabric by weaving

H4500.def: = wooden bar, approximately 5-6 centimeters in diameter; ◄ part of weaving equiment; ► used for attaching the warp threads to and to roll up the finished cloth as it grows in length; ≈ associated with thickness and heaviness

H1661.def: = basin ◄ hewn out of a rock or lined with plaster ► into which harvested grapes were thrown and trampled to squeeze out the juice, which from there flowed into a {L:trough or vat<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}; ≈ treading a winepress is often used as a figure of speech to refer to God's anger and punishment

H8337.def: = state in which a countable entity is six in number

H676.def: = one of the five long and slender projections of the human hand; ► used for writing, pointing, grasping, and other activities; ≈ sometimes used metonymically to represent the entire body

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H702.def: = state in which a countable entity is four in number
